title: Calories in 1/4 Cup Blueberries
meta_description: Discover calories in 1/4 cup blueberries, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, and full nutrition breakdown per serving.
assumptions: Fresh, whole blueberries; 1 cup ≈148 g, so 1/4 cup ≈37 g; raw, no added sugar.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, ripeness, fresh vs. frozen, and portion measurement. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 1/4 cup blueberries has about 21 kcal and 5 g carbs, mostly from natural sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Dried blueberries (per 1/4 cup by volume, denser)

faqs.q: How many calories in 1/4 cup blueberries?
What are the carbs in 1/4 cup blueberries?
faqs.a: About 5.4 g total carbs, including 0.9 g fiber and 3.7 g sugars.

faqs.q: Are blueberries low in fat and protein?
faqs.a: Yes, only 0.1 g fat and 0.3 g protein per 1/4 cup.

faqs.q: How does frozen affect calories in 1/4 cup blueberries?
faqs.a: Frozen has similar calories to fresh, around 21 kcal, with minimal nutrient loss.

faqs.q: What's the fiber content in 1/4 cup blueberries?
faqs.a: Roughly 0.9 g dietary fiber, supporting digestion.
